title: An individual agreement shall be entered into by the developer so appointed under DRP by DRP (SRA) with the eligible hutment dwellers of each structure in the slum/pavement
clause_text: An individual agreement shall be entered into by the developer so appointed under DRP by DRP (SRA) with the eligible hutment dwellers of each structure in the slum/pavement.
